user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screenshot shows the Amazon website on a mobile browser. The open menu displays various options for the current URL, such as "Open in new tab," "Copy link address," "Download link," and "Share link." It is a context menu typically accessed by clicking on a link or icon. The page features Amazon's homepage with product categories like "Deals" and "Best Sellers."
history_actions: click on the "Chrome" browser app icon located at the lower right part of the screen.
click on the browser's address/URL bar located at the middle and top part of the screen.
click on the second search suggestion located at middle and upper part of the screen.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
action_plan: Close the context menu by tapping outside or selecting another option on the screen.

action_with_memory.Next Single Step Action: Close the context menu by tapping outside or selecting another option on the screen.
